name: Little bee with a dream
description:
I am a novice developer.
This is my first game.
 In it you play as a bee,
 who wants to become a wasp.
 The game has heaven and hell.
 You have to give different
 beings what
what they want.
 This game was made in 2 weeks.
Do you have reasons to download
 it only out of curiosity.
I do not speak English.
 Sorry for possible mistakes.
